alert.note: Alert for Niagara (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Lake Effect Snow Warning issued November 17 at 2:19PM EST until November 20 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...LAKE EFFECT SNOW WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM FRIDAY TO 7 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 16 inches in the most persistent lake snows. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph will produce patchy blowing snow. * WHERE...Niagara county. * WHEN...From 7 PM Friday to 7 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The heavy snow could also bring down some tree limbs and cause scattered power outages. Experimental content below...do not use operationally To view the experimental polygons please see: http://www.weather.gov/buf/lespolygon COORD...4287 7829 4306 7823 4313 7848 4304 7901 4298 7902 4288 7889 4281 7890 4249 7945 4248 7937 4264 7869 TIME Y22M11D18T0000Z-Y22M11D18T0600Z COORD...4320 7854 4329 7867 4330 7879 4326 7900 4322 7906 4307 7909 4293 7897 4290 7884 4297 7869 4307 7859 TIME Y22M11D19T1200Z-Y22M11D20T0600Z
info.instruction: Heavy snow will fall in relatively narrow bands. If traveling, be prepared for rapidly changing road conditions and visibilities. Submit snow reports through our website or social media.
